text: “ Glee ” star Kevin McHale declared that the newly released Ariana Grande song is “ gayer ” than he is. The actor, who starred on the musical series as Artie Abrams for six seasons, publicly addressed his sexuality for the first time amid rumors that he ’ s dating actor Austin McKenzie. ″ # NoTearsLeftToCry is gayer than me and I ACCEPT. Ty @ ArianaGrande, ” he wrote on Twitter Friday in one of several tweets praising the pop star. # NoTearsLeftToCry is gayer than me and I ACCEPT. Ty @ ArianaGrande. — Kevin McHale ( @ druidDUDE ) April 20, 2018 He also requested that
